oihUid.description: Uniquely identifies a record within a OIH instance. This identifier is provided by the respective OIH instance, or, at least, the OIH defines how the identifier is assigned (e.g. a random UUID given by a connector. TDB!).

oihCreated.description: The timestamp when the record was created within the OIH as a UNIX timestamp.

oihLastModified.description: The timestamp when the record was modified within the OIH the last time as a UNIX timestamp.

oihApplicationRecords.description: Each application record maps the OIH data record to a corresponding record in an application or service which is integrated via the OIH.

ApplicationDataRecord.description: An application data record identifies the corresponding record of an OIH data record within an application or service which os connected to an OIH instance

applicationUid.description: Identifies the application or service the record belongs to within the OIH.

recordUid.description: The record's UID within the respective application.

created.description: The timestamp when the record was created within the application as a UNIX timestamp.

lastModified.description: The timestamp when the record was modified in the application the last time as a UNIX timestamp.
